author: Veronika Kero
title: 20 DIY projects to help you (or the kids) stay sharp while at home
description: There are only so many hours you can watch Netflix or play Animal Crossing until you crave some other activity (and brain stimulation). Plus, doing something constructive might inspire your kids (or roommates) and keep their minds curious during these weird t…
